thread.title: In Alabama, Bivalves and Beer
thread.title_full: In Alabama, Bivalves and Beer - The New York Times

author: Diane Daniel
title: In Alabama, Bivalves and Beer
text:
The Hangout Oyster Cook-Off & Craft Beer Weekend in Gulf Shores, Ala. , on Nov. 6 and 7 will showcase oysters and oyster-themed dishes from more than 65 chefs, including Anne Burrell from the Food Network and the James Beard Foundation award winners Alon Shaya of Domenica and Ryan Prewitt of Pêche, both from New Orleans.
